content.original: The Hypervelocity Autocannon (HVAC) family of weapons is based on the Autocannon. While they have the same damage classes, they're capable of firing much further. However, in order to obtain the increased ballistic range, the hypervelocity ammo is larger and uses a unique type of propellant, reducing the number of shots per ton of ammo along with a couple other drawbacks, such as a chance of the weapon exploding, and a thick smoke trail every time the weapon is fired. Uses HVAC10 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Hypervelocity Autocannon (HVAC) family of weapons is based on the Autocannon. While they have the same damage classes, they're capable of firing much further. However, in order to obtain the increased ballistic range, the hypervelocity ammo is larger and uses a unique type of propellant, reducing the number of shots per ton of ammo along with a couple other drawbacks, such as a chance of the weapon exploding, and a thick smoke trail every time the weapon is fired. Uses HVAC10 Ammo.
content.content: 超高速自动加农炮(HVAC)系列武器是以自动炮为基础的.虽然和普通自动炮有相同等级的伤害,但他们的射程要远的多.然而,为了获得更大的弹道射程,超高速弹药更大,并使用了特殊推进剂,这降低了每吨弹药的发数,同时还存在这诸如武器爆炸,每次开火产生浓烟等一些其他缺点. 使用HVAC10弹药.

content.original: Developed by Lubalin Ballistics for the Terran Hegemony, the LB-X Autocannon was a derivative of the standard and relatively primitive Autocannon design. Taking advantage of advanced materials, the company was able to reduce the weight of the weapon for only a slight increase in bulk and mated it with the advanced Mercury-VII targeting system to boost its effective range. Uses LBX10 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by Lubalin Ballistics for the Terran Hegemony, the LB-X Autocannon was a derivative of the standard and relatively primitive Autocannon design. Taking advantage of advanced materials, the company was able to reduce the weight of the weapon for only a slight increase in bulk and mated it with the advanced Mercury-VII targeting system to boost its effective range. Uses LBX10 Ammo.
content.content: 由卢巴林弹道公司为人类霸权开发的LB-X自动炮是标准和相对原始的自动炮的衍生品.该公司利用先进材料,仅需稍微稍微增加体积即可减轻武器重量,可以将其与先进水星VII瞄准系统配合,以提高其射程. 使用LBX10弹药.

content.original: The Autocannon LB 10-X-P is the prototype of what eventually became the normal LB 10-X. Developed to fill the need for a dual-purpose weapon capable of both powerful direct fire as well as anti-air fire, the LB 10-X-P utilizes two different ammunition types: traditional armor-piercing shells as well as flechette shells that proved as equally capable in anti-air roles as in anti-armor and anti-personnel roles. The SLDF debuted the prototype autocannon in time to participate in the final battles in both the Rim Worlds Republic and the Taurian Concordat, while those two nations fielded only a relative handful of prototypes before the end of the war.
content.prevOriginal: The Autocannon LB 10-X-P is the prototype of what eventually became the normal LB 10-X. Developed to fill the need for a dual-purpose weapon capable of both powerful direct fire as well as anti-air fire, the LB 10-X-P utilizes two different ammunition types: traditional armor-piercing shells as well as flechette shells that proved as equally capable in anti-air roles as in anti-armor and anti-personnel roles. The SLDF debuted the prototype autocannon in time to participate in the final battles in both the Rim Worlds Republic and the Taurian Concordat, while those two nations fielded only a relative handful of prototypes before the end of the war.
content.content: 自动加农炮LB 10-X-P是最终成为普通LB 10-X的原型.LB10-X-P是为了满足对既有强大直接火力又有防空火力的两用武器的需求而开发的,它使用了两种不同的弹药类型:传统的穿甲弹和箭型弹,它们在防空上与在反装甲和杀伤人员上同样有效.星联防卫军及时推出了自动加农炮原型,参加了外部世界联盟和金牛座协约国的最后战斗,而这两个国家在战争结束前只派出了相对少数的原型.

content.original: An offshoot of the Light AC program is this Autocannon lighter and smaller but suffers similar drawbacks to the production models and a higher likelihood to JAM. Uses AC10 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: An offshoot of the Light AC program is this Autocannon lighter and smaller but suffers similar drawbacks to the production models and a higher likelihood to JAM. Uses AC10 Ammo.
content.content: 轻型AC工程是自动炮的一种更轻、更小的分支.但也有类似缺点,而且卡住的可能性更高. 使用AC弹药.

content.original: Ultra Autocannons boast double the rate of fire of a regular Autocannon, with only moderate increases in weight, size, and heat. The UAC/10 is your standard heavy gun, with all-around good damage, range, and heat efficiency. Uses UAC10 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Ultra Autocannons boast double the rate of fire of a regular Autocannon, with only moderate increases in weight, size, and heat. The UAC/10 is your standard heavy gun, with all-around good damage, range, and heat efficiency. Uses UAC10 Ammo.
content.content: 终极自动炮到射速是普通自动炮的两倍,重量、体积和热量只是适度增加.UAC10是最适合你的标准重型炮,具有全面良好的伤害、射程和热效率. 使用UAC10弹药.

content.original: Binary Lasers (nicknamed 'Blazers') fused two Large Laser cores together, allowing them to be fired together. While this increased penetration and range the beam cohesion suffered. Alternately the cores could be discharged separately, functioning much like individual Large Lasers
content.prevOriginal: Binary Lasers (nicknamed 'Blazers') fused two Large Laser cores together, allowing them to be fired together. While this increased penetration and range the beam cohesion suffered. Alternately the cores could be discharged separately, functioning much like individual Large Lasers
content.content: 双体激光(绰号'开拓者')将两个大激光芯熔合在一起,允许它们一起发射.虽然这增加了穿透和射程,但结构的内聚力受到了影响.另一种方法是,芯体可以单独攻击,其功能很像单个大型激光.

content.original: The Extended Range Flamer (or ER Flamer) is a longer-range, weaker version of the fusion-based Flamer. First developed by Clan Jade Falcon and introduced to the Inner Sphere by the Federated Suns, the Extended Range Flamer uses tighter magnetic coils and a narrower muzzle diameter to increase the weapon's range.
content.prevOriginal: The Extended Range Flamer (or ER Flamer) is a longer-range, weaker version of the fusion-based Flamer. First developed by Clan Jade Falcon and introduced to the Inner Sphere by the Federated Suns, the Extended Range Flamer uses tighter magnetic coils and a narrower muzzle diameter to increase the weapon's range.
content.content: 增程喷火器(ER 喷火器)是一种射程更远的,威力更弱的聚变喷火器.被碧玉鹰氏族开发,并有联合太阳引入到内天体,增程喷火器使用更紧密的磁线圈和更窄的枪口直径来增加武器的射程.

content.original: The Vehicle Flamer performs the same as a 'Mech-mounted Flamer, venting superheated gases at a target to cause it to overheat/burn up. As most non-'Mech combat units lack expensive fusion reactors do Vehicle Flamers draw from a pool of combusting ''ammunition'' instead. Uses Vehicle Flamer Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Vehicle Flamer performs the same as a 'Mech-mounted Flamer, venting superheated gases at a target to cause it to overheat/burn up. As most non-'Mech combat units lack expensive fusion reactors do Vehicle Flamers draw from a pool of combusting ''ammunition'' instead. Uses Vehicle Flamer Ammo.
content.content: 车载喷火器的性能与机甲安装的喷火器相同,在目标处排放过热气体,使其过热/燃烧.由于大多数非"机甲"单位缺乏昂贵的聚变反应器,车辆的喷火器使用燃烧的弹药取而代之. 使用车辆喷火器弹药.

content.original: The Fluid Gun is nothing more than a militarized Fluid Sprayer system. By toughening the feed lines and storage tanks, the engineers of Solaris VII created a system roughly equivalent to a Flamer. Unlike the flamer however, the Fluid Gun can store and spray a variety of fluid types. Clever arena fighters have used water, oil slicks, Inferno Fuel, Cooling Fluid, and Corrosive Fluids in matches. Uses Fluid Canisters (Ammo).

content.content: 液体喷枪只不过是一个军事化的液体喷射器.索拉里斯VII的工程师们通过强化供给管线和储罐,创建了一个大致相当于火焰器的系统.然而,与火焰器不同; 液体喷枪可以存储并喷射多种液体.聪明的竟技场战士在比赛中使用了水、浮油、炼狱燃料、冷却液和腐蚀性液体. 使用液体罐(弹药).

content.original: A Gauss Rifle uses electromagnetic charges to accelerate metallic rounds at extremely high speed, dealing massive damage by kinetic force alone. Uses Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: A Gauss Rifle uses electromagnetic charges to accelerate metallic rounds at extremely high speed, dealing massive damage by kinetic force alone. Uses Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.content: 高斯线膛炮使用电磁电荷以极高的速度发射金属子弹,单靠动能造成巨大的伤害. 使用高斯弹药 不稳定!

布莱克威尔高斯线膛炮
布莱克威尔高斯线膛炮

content.original: The Heavy Gauss Rifle is a new, deadly innovation by Lyran Alliance scientists in conjunction with a manufacturing cooperation between Defiance Industries and TharHes. Applying their ''bigger is better'' philosophy to Gauss technology, the Heavy Gauss Rifle is one of the heaviest battlefield weapons in existence. Uses Heavy Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: The Heavy Gauss Rifle is a new, deadly innovation by Lyran Alliance scientists in conjunction with a manufacturing cooperation between Defiance Industries and TharHes. Applying their ''bigger is better'' philosophy to Gauss technology, the Heavy Gauss Rifle is one of the heaviest battlefield weapons in existence. Uses Heavy Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.content: 重型高斯线膛炮是天琴座同盟国科学家与达法恩工业公司和塔里斯公司合作开发的一项新的致命创造.将其"越多越好"的理念应用于高斯技术,重型高斯是现存最重的战场设备之一. 使用重型高斯弹药 不稳定!

content.original: The Light Gauss Rifle was introduced by the Free Worlds League. It functions identically to a Gauss Rifle, electromagnetically accelerating a slug to high speeds to cause massive damage at long range. As its name suggests, however, the Light Gauss Rifle is designed to be more compact, allowing Gauss Rifles to be mounted on smaller combat units. Uses Light Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: The Light Gauss Rifle was introduced by the Free Worlds League. It functions identically to a Gauss Rifle, electromagnetically accelerating a slug to high speeds to cause massive damage at long range. As its name suggests, however, the Light Gauss Rifle is designed to be more compact, allowing Gauss Rifles to be mounted on smaller combat units. Uses Light Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.content: 轻型高斯线膛炮是有自由世界联盟推出的.它的功能和高斯线膛炮相同,使用电磁将弹头加速到高速,能远程造成巨大伤害.然而,顾名思义,轻型高斯设计的更紧凑,允许高斯线膛炮安装在较小的作战单位上. 使用轻型高斯弹药 不稳定!

content.original: The NAIS developed the Silver Bullet Gauss Rifle (or SB Gauss) in an attempt to bring the functionality of an LB-X Autocannon to the Gauss Rifle. Though the cluster-like ammunition made it easier to hit a target and was particularly effective in the anti-aircraft role, gave them a unreliable damage profile. Uses Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: The NAIS developed the Silver Bullet Gauss Rifle (or SB Gauss) in an attempt to bring the functionality of an LB-X Autocannon to the Gauss Rifle. Though the cluster-like ammunition made it easier to hit a target and was particularly effective in the anti-aircraft role, gave them a unreliable damage profile. Uses Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.content: NAIS开发了银弹高斯线膛炮(或SB高斯),试图将LB-X自动炮的功能加入到高斯线膛炮.虽然集群弹药更容易集中目标,并且在防空任务中特别有效,但它的损伤曲线并不十分优秀. 使用高斯弹药 不稳定!

content.original: This 'MagShot Cannon' is based upon the technologies of AP MagShot Gauss Rifles for BattleMechs and the Free Worlds League Light Gauss Rifle has Johnston Industries Managed to create a Ultra Light Weight Gauss Rifle. Unusually it uses standard magshot ammo, but launches a ''stack'' of five slugs remain together in flight, separate projectiles all hitting the same place resist some types of reactive armor. An alternate ''burst mode'' fires five slugs individually machine gun style. Fires 5 Rounds Per Shot. Uses Magshot Ammo.. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: This 'MagShot Cannon' is based upon the technologies of AP MagShot Gauss Rifles for BattleMechs and the Free Worlds League Light Gauss Rifle has Johnston Industries Managed to create a Ultra Light Weight Gauss Rifle. Unusually it uses standard magshot ammo, but launches a ''stack'' of five slugs remain together in flight, separate projectiles all hitting the same place resist some types of reactive armor. An alternate ''burst mode'' fires five slugs individually machine gun style. Fires 5 Rounds Per Shot. Uses Magshot Ammo.. VOLATILE!
content.content: 这种'弹射加农炮'是基于AP弹射高斯线膛炮的技术和自由世界联盟轻型高斯线膛炮的约翰斯顿工业公司成功地创造了一种超轻量高斯线膛炮.不同寻常的是,它使用标准弹射药,但发射的'堆叠'五个弹头在飞行中保持在一起,单独的射弹会击中同一个地方,可以抵抗某些类型的反应装甲.另一种'爆裂模式'分别以机枪的方式发射五颗子弹.每轮5发,使用弹射弹药..不稳定!

content.original: Though the Heavy Gauss Rifle was mostly effective, engineers thought they could improve the ballistic performance of the projectile. This would lead to a more consistent damage profile, making the Improved Heavy Gauss Rifle effective at all ranges. After four years of work, the engineers had created a weapon that occupied the same amount of space as the Heavy Gauss Rifle but was able to inflict consistent damage at all ranges. Uses Heavy Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: Though the Heavy Gauss Rifle was mostly effective, engineers thought they could improve the ballistic performance of the projectile. This would lead to a more consistent damage profile, making the Improved Heavy Gauss Rifle effective at all ranges. After four years of work, the engineers had created a weapon that occupied the same amount of space as the Heavy Gauss Rifle but was able to inflict consistent damage at all ranges. Uses Heavy Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.content: 虽然重型高斯线膛炮大部分时候都是有效的,但工程师们认为他们可以提高弹丸的弹道性能.这将提供更一致的损伤分布,使改进后的重型高斯线膛炮在所有射程都有效.经过四年的工作,工程师们创造出了一种武器,其占用空间和重型高斯线膛炮相同,但能够在所有射程范围拥有一致的性损伤曲线. 使用重型高斯弹药 不稳定!

content.original: A 'Mech sized version of the Infantry MagShot Gauss Rifle Prototype for testing in the sands of Solaris as an alternative to Medium Laser arrays. Uses MagShot Ammo.. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: A 'Mech sized version of the Infantry MagShot Gauss Rifle Prototype for testing in the sands of Solaris as an alternative to Medium Laser arrays. Uses MagShot Ammo.. VOLATILE!
content.content: 一种和机甲大小匹配的步兵高斯线膛炮原型.以中型激光阵列的替代品在索拉里斯的沙漠里测试.使用弹丸弹药.不稳定!

content.original: A prototype of the Extended-Range Large Laser.
content.prevOriginal: A prototype of the Extended-Range Large Laser.

content.original: The Large Variable Speed Pulse Laser is the largest Variable Speed Pulse Lasers in use. Weighing almost as much as a Heavy PPC, the Large VSP Laser can inflict nearly as much damage on a target, and has a better chance of hitting the target. Decreased Damage and Heat the Further you move
content.prevOriginal: The Large Variable Speed Pulse Laser is the largest Variable Speed Pulse Lasers in use. Weighing almost as much as a Heavy PPC, the Large VSP Laser can inflict nearly as much damage on a target, and has a better chance of hitting the target. Decreased Damage and Heat the Further you move
content.content: 大型变速脉冲(VSP)激光是目前使用的最大的变速脉冲激光.大型VSP激光的重量几乎相当于重型粒子炮,可以对目标造成几乎相同的伤害,并有更高的命中率. 移动越远伤害和产热越低

content.original: X-Pulse Lasers are an attempt by Federated Commonwealth technicians to increase the range of Pulse Lasers to compete with the longer ranges of standard models. X-Pulse lasers are not a new weapon per se, but an upgrade to Pulse Lasers that pushes extra energy through the system in order to extend the range.
content.prevOriginal: X-Pulse Lasers are an attempt by Federated Commonwealth technicians to increase the range of Pulse Lasers to compete with the longer ranges of standard models. X-Pulse lasers are not a new weapon per se, but an upgrade to Pulse Lasers that pushes extra energy through the system in order to extend the range.
content.content: X脉冲激光是联邦技术人员的一项尝试,目的是增加脉冲激光的射程,以于标准型号在更长射程上竞争.X脉冲激光本身不是一种新武器,而是对脉冲激光的一种升级,它通过系统增加额外的能量,以增加其射程.

content.original: Developed by the Lyran Alliance, the Bombast Laser was designed to be the ultimate word in laser weapons. During the design process, its engineers had to reduce the weight of the weapon. This sacrifice came from the power supply, which gave the weapon a long charge-time.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Lyran Alliance, the Bombast Laser was designed to be the ultimate word in laser weapons. During the design process, its engineers had to reduce the weight of the weapon. This sacrifice came from the power supply, which gave the weapon a long charge-time.
content.content: 由天琴同盟国开发,璀璨激光被设计为激光武器的最终解释.在设计过程中,其工程师不得不降低武器的重量.这种牺牲来自于电源,这使武器需要长时间充能.

content.original: Re-engineered Lasers were developed by trying to mate a Pulse laser with a Heavy Laser. Though unsuccessful in that effort the weapons created had one odd benefit: They totally ignored specialty anti-laser armors, inflicting their full damage on a unit equipped with such armor. The twin pulses fired by a Re-engineered Laser hit so close together on a target that they bore straight through.
content.prevOriginal: Re-engineered Lasers were developed by trying to mate a Pulse laser with a Heavy Laser. Though unsuccessful in that effort the weapons created had one odd benefit: They totally ignored specialty anti-laser armors, inflicting their full damage on a unit equipped with such armor. The twin pulses fired by a Re-engineered Laser hit so close together on a target that they bore straight through.
content.content: 重设计激光是通过尝试将脉冲激光和重型激光匹配而开发的.尽管这一努力失败了,但所开发出来的武器有一个奇怪的好处: 他们完全忽视了专业反激光装甲,对装备有该装甲的单位造成了完全上海.重新设计的激光器发射的双脉冲如此紧密地命中目标,以至于直接直接穿透了它.

content.original: The Medium Variable Speed Pulse Laser is, as its name suggests, the mid-sized version of the Variable Speed Pulse Lasers in use. Decreased Damage and Heat the Further you move
content.prevOriginal: The Medium Variable Speed Pulse Laser is, as its name suggests, the mid-sized version of the Variable Speed Pulse Lasers in use. Decreased Damage and Heat the Further you move
content.content: 名为启示的正在使用的中型变速脉冲(VSP)激光, 移动越远伤害和产热就越低

content.content: 名为启示小型变速脉冲激光的正在使用的最小的变速脉冲(VSP)激光. 这种武器通常被安装在小型脉冲激光的位置,主要用于轻型机甲上. 移动越远伤害和产热就越低

content.original: Another recreation of Star League tech, this Target Acquisition Gear combines several active scanning systems to act like a Mech-sized laser pointer and share targeting information with the Lance.
content.prevOriginal: Another recreation of Star League tech, this Target Acquisition Gear combines several active scanning systems to act like a Mech-sized laser pointer and share targeting information with the Lance.
content.content: 星联科技的另一个创新,这种目标捕获装备(TAG)结合了几个主动扫描系统,就像一个机甲的激光指示器,并将目标信息共享给小队.

content.original: This target was TAG'ed. +1 to hit.
content.prevOriginal: This target was TAG'ed. +1 to hit.

content.content: 目标捕获装备增加可见性

content.original: Visual indicator of the TAG effect
content.prevOriginal: Visual indicator of the TAG effect

content.original: Enhanced Long Range Missiles were developed by the Federated Commonwealth in response to the superior performance of Clan weaponry. These new LRMs use a more sophisticated arming mechanism to increase their viability at close range. The result has been a much smaller blind spot compared to traditional LRMs while still retaining the same long-range functionality. While not having a minimum range does it vastly reduced damage at those ranges.
content.prevOriginal: Enhanced Long Range Missiles were developed by the Federated Commonwealth in response to the superior performance of Clan weaponry. These new LRMs use a more sophisticated arming mechanism to increase their viability at close range. The result has been a much smaller blind spot compared to traditional LRMs while still retaining the same long-range functionality. While not having a minimum range does it vastly reduced damage at those ranges.
content.content: 增强型远程导弹是联邦为了应对氏族性能卓越的武器而开发的. 这些新型远程导弹使用更复杂的武装机制来提高其在近距离的生存能力. 结果是,与远程导弹相比,盲点小得多,同时仍保持相同的远程功能. 虽然没有最低射程,但在近距离下伤害会大大降低

content.original: The Extended LRM (ELRM) system was designed by engineers in the Federated Commonwealth. The ELRM pairs a standard LRM to a booster system that gives the missile more fuel, and thus, more range. Offsetting the range advantage is the fact that the minimum range of the weapon is increased by over 50%, combined with a reduced ammunition capacity and a heavier, bulkier launcher.
content.prevOriginal: The Extended LRM (ELRM) system was designed by engineers in the Federated Commonwealth. The ELRM pairs a standard LRM to a booster system that gives the missile more fuel, and thus, more range. Offsetting the range advantage is the fact that the minimum range of the weapon is increased by over 50%, combined with a reduced ammunition capacity and a heavier, bulkier launcher.
content.content: 增程LRM(ELRM)系统由联邦的工程师设计. ELRM将标准LRM与助推器系统匹配,从而为导弹提供更多燃料,以增加射程. 抵消射程优势的是,武器的最低射程增加了50%以上,在加上弹容量减少且发射器更重、更笨重.

content.original: Machine Gun Arrays are multiple Machine Guns linked together to fire simultaneously, this consists of 3 Heavy Machine Guns. Uses HMG Ammo. Left Click on Ammocount/Damage value during battle to switch firing mode
content.prevOriginal: Machine Gun Arrays are multiple Machine Guns linked together to fire simultaneously, this consists of 3 Heavy Machine Guns. Uses HMG Ammo. Left Click on Ammocount/Damage value during battle to switch firing mode
content.content: 机枪阵列是多支机枪连接在一起同时开火,由3支重机枪组成.氏族版本在更高的开火频率下也不容易卡壳. 使用重机枪弹药 左键点击 数量/伤害 以切换射击模式

content.original: Machine Gun Arrays are multiple Machine Guns linked together to fire simultaneously, this consists of 4 Light Machine Guns. Uses LMG Ammo. Left Click on Ammocount/Damage value during battle to switch firing mode
content.prevOriginal: Machine Gun Arrays are multiple Machine Guns linked together to fire simultaneously, this consists of 4 Light Machine Guns. Uses LMG Ammo. Left Click on Ammocount/Damage value during battle to switch firing mode
content.content: 机枪阵列是多支机枪连接在一起同时开火,由4支轻机枪组成. 使用轻机枪弹药 左键点击 数量/伤害 以切换射击模式

content.original: Machine Guns deal very little damage, have severely limited range, and depend upon volatile ammunition stores. However, they have a greatly increased chance to cause Criticals when they impact a target that has been stripped of its armor. Uses MG Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Machine Guns deal very little damage, have severely limited range, and depend upon volatile ammunition stores. However, they have a greatly increased chance to cause Criticals when they impact a target that has been stripped of its armor. Uses MG Ammo.
content.content: 机枪造成的伤害非常低,射程非常有限,并且依赖于不稳定的弹药. 然而,当他们撞击已剥去装甲的目标时,造成严重损伤的机率大大增加. 使用机枪弹药.

content.original: As its name implies, the Heavy Machine Gun is less a Machine gun and more like and automated Grenade Launcher. The HMG does more damage and has a better chance of penetrating and destroying critical components, but weighs twice as much, and suffers from recoil. Uses HMG Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: As its name implies, the Heavy Machine Gun is less a Machine gun and more like and automated Grenade Launcher. The HMG does more damage and has a better chance of penetrating and destroying critical components, but weighs twice as much, and suffers from recoil. Uses HMG Ammo.
content.content: 顾名思义,重机枪(HMG)与其说是机枪(MG),不如说是自动榴弹发射器. HMG造成的伤害更大,穿透和摧毁关键部件的机会更大,但重量是普通机枪的两倍,并且存在后座问题. 使用重机枪弹药.

content.original: The Light Machine Gun fires smaller caliber shells, but boasts a higher rate of fire and increased range over a standard Machine Gun. Uses LMG Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Light Machine Gun fires smaller caliber shells, but boasts a higher rate of fire and increased range over a standard Machine Gun. Uses LMG Ammo.
content.content: 轻机枪(LMG)发射小口径炮弹,但拥有比标准机枪更高的射速和更大的射程. 使用轻机枪弹药.

content.original: Machine Guns deal very little damage, have severely limited range, and depend upon volatile ammunition stores. However, they have a greatly increased chance to cause Criticals when they impact a target that has been stripped of its armor. This one is just two welded together to operate off a single hardpoint. Uses MG Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Machine Guns deal very little damage, have severely limited range, and depend upon volatile ammunition stores. However, they have a greatly increased chance to cause Criticals when they impact a target that has been stripped of its armor. This one is just two welded together to operate off a single hardpoint. Uses MG Ammo.
content.content: 机枪造成的伤害非常低,射程非常有限,并且依赖于不稳定的弹药. 然而,当他们撞击已剥去装甲的目标时,造成严重损伤的机率大大增加. 这个只是将两个普通机枪焊接在一起,只占用一个挂载点. U使用机枪弹药

content.original: Based on the weapon used by infantry for centuries, the Mech Mortar fires a small shell in a high arc that falls onto the target. Though the Mech Mortar was created by the Terran Hegemony, by 2835 the Succession Wars had relegated it to history. With the reintroduction of the Anti-Missile System, engineers revived the Mech Mortar concept. The munitions used by the mortars, though often possessing limited guidance packages, weren't destroyed by AMS systems in tests. Mortar shells also proved very adaptable, accepting several types of payloads. Uses Mortar Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Based on the weapon used by infantry for centuries, the Mech Mortar fires a small shell in a high arc that falls onto the target. Though the Mech Mortar was created by the Terran Hegemony, by 2835 the Succession Wars had relegated it to history. With the reintroduction of the Anti-Missile System, engineers revived the Mech Mortar concept. The munitions used by the mortars, though often possessing limited guidance packages, weren't destroyed by AMS systems in tests. Mortar shells also proved very adaptable, accepting several types of payloads. Uses Mortar Ammo.
content.content: 基于步兵几个世纪以来使用的武器,机甲迫击炮能够以高弧度发射一枚小炮弹落在目标上. 虽然机甲迫击炮是人类霸权发明的,但到了2835年,继承战争已将其变为历史. 随着反导系统的重新引入,工程师们重新提出了机甲迫击炮的概念. 迫击炮使用的弹药,尽管通常是有限制导包,但在测试中没有被AMS系统摧毁. 迫击炮弹的适应性也很强,可以使用多种类型弹药. 使用迫击炮弹药

content.original: Multi-Missile Launchers can fire both LRM and SRM, including any special warhead types, and are compatible with the Artemis IV fire control system. Uses SRM/LRM Ammo. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to toggle between LRM or SRM.
content.prevOriginal: Multi-Missile Launchers can fire both LRM and SRM, including any special warhead types, and are compatible with the Artemis IV fire control system. Uses SRM/LRM Ammo. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to toggle between LRM or SRM.
content.content: 多联装导弹发射器可以发射LRM和SRM,包括任何特殊弹头类型,并与月神IV火控系统兼容. 使用SRM/LRM弹药. 左键点击弹药可以在战斗中切换SRM/LRM弹药模式 .

content.original: The Medium-Range Missile Launcher was designed by scientists at Luthien Armor Works. MRMs are dead-fire missiles that are fired more like lasers than missiles. In order to pack as many missiles as possible into one salvo, scientists removed guidance systems and made the whole package smaller. Though this was seen as a step backwards in technological development, the inexpensive and deadly MRMs have spread throughout the Draconis Combine and to many mercenary units. Uses MRM Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Medium-Range Missile Launcher was designed by scientists at Luthien Armor Works. MRMs are dead-fire missiles that are fired more like lasers than missiles. In order to pack as many missiles as possible into one salvo, scientists removed guidance systems and made the whole package smaller. Though this was seen as a step backwards in technological development, the inexpensive and deadly MRMs have spread throughout the Draconis Combine and to many mercenary units. Uses MRM Ammo.
content.content: 中程导弹发射器(MRM)是由Luhine Amor Works的科学家设计的.MRM是死火导弹,发射的方式更像激光,而不是导弹. 为了将尽可能多的到导弹一齐发射,科学家们拆除了它们的制导系统,并使整个整个武器包更小. 尽管这被视为技术发展的一步,但廉价且致命的MRM在天龙联合体和许多雇用兵单位中传播. 使用MRM弹药。

content.original: This Plasma Cannon prototype accelerates and superheats a cartridge of 'plastic foam' into an excited state and release it as plasma, creating a tremendous kinetic and thermal impact. Uses Plasma Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: This Plasma Cannon prototype accelerates and superheats a cartridge of 'plastic foam' into an excited state and release it as plasma, creating a tremendous kinetic and thermal impact. Uses Plasma Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.content: 这个等离子加农炮原型将一个"等离子泡沫"弹药加速并加热到激发态,将其转换为等离子体发射,产生巨大的动能和热冲击. 使用等离子弹药 不稳定!.

content.original: High energy residue reduces heat efficiency by 15%.
content.prevOriginal: High energy residue reduces heat efficiency by 15%.

content.original: Researched by the Draconis Combine, the Heavy PPC is a larger, more potent version of the Particle Projector Cannon, capable of delivering a devastating blow to both the enemy and their sensors. Left Click on Chance to Hit during battle to toggle the Field Inhibitor. (FIOFF) Has no minimum range penalty but can Misfire.
content.prevOriginal: Researched by the Draconis Combine, the Heavy PPC is a larger, more potent version of the Particle Projector Cannon, capable of delivering a devastating blow to both the enemy and their sensors. Left Click on Chance to Hit during battle to toggle the Field Inhibitor. (FIOFF) Has no minimum range penalty but can Misfire.
content.content: 重型粒子炮是由天龙联合体开发,是粒子投射加农炮的更大、更强版本,能够对敌人及其传感器造成毁灭性打击. 在战斗中左键点击以切换到场抑制器关闭(FIOFF)模式,没有最低射程惩罚,但可能失火.
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: A Word of Blake Heavy PPC Design with Integrated Capacitor, the 'Divine Wrath' is able to fire a even stronger and devastating Particle Beam at a longe range and without the minimum range. Left Click on Chance to Hit during battle to toggle the Capacitor. Active Capacitor increase Damage, Heat and Range at a chance to 'jam'.
content.prevOriginal: A Word of Blake Heavy PPC Design with Integrated Capacitor, the 'Divine Wrath' is able to fire a even stronger and devastating Particle Beam at a longe range and without the minimum range. Left Click on Chance to Hit during battle to toggle the Capacitor. Active Capacitor increase Damage, Heat and Range at a chance to 'jam'.
content.content: 布莱克之道的重型粒子炮设计有内置电容器,'天罚'没有最低射程,且可以在远程下射出更强更具毁灭力的粒子束. 在战斗中左键点击以起用电容器.激活电容器会增加伤害、射程,有机会卡壳.
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: The Light PPC is a lighter version of the Particle Projector Cannon. Researched by the Draconis Combine, it does less damage and has shorter range than a PPC, but comes in at less than half the weight.
content.prevOriginal: The Light PPC is a lighter version of the Particle Projector Cannon. Researched by the Draconis Combine, it does less damage and has shorter range than a PPC, but comes in at less than half the weight.
content.content: 轻型粒子炮是粒子投射炮的较轻版本. 天龙联合体的眼睛表明,它的伤害较小,射程比标准PPC短,但重量不到一半.
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: A light PPC combined with a PPC Capacitator.
content.prevOriginal: A light PPC combined with a PPC Capacitator.
content.content: 一种和电容器融合的轻型粒子炮
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: The Snub-Nose PPC is to a Particle Projector Cannon as a sawed-off shotgun is to a shotgun. This version of the PPC is slightly lighter than a standard PPC, but its energy discharge trails off considerably faster, leading to shorter range and reduced damage capacity over range. An interesting side benefit is the dramatically increased short range, longer than almost any other weapon.
content.prevOriginal: The Snub-Nose PPC is to a Particle Projector Cannon as a sawed-off shotgun is to a shotgun. This version of the PPC is slightly lighter than a standard PPC, but its energy discharge trails off considerably faster, leading to shorter range and reduced damage capacity over range. An interesting side benefit is the dramatically increased short range, longer than almost any other weapon.
content.content: 平头PPC和粒子投射炮的关系锯断的霰弹枪和霰弹枪之间的关系一样. 这个版本的PPC比标准PPC稍轻,但其能量释放速度要快得多,导致射程较短,在射程内的伤害能力降低. 一个有趣的副作用是,近射程大幅增加. 比几乎任何其他武器都长.
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: The Rotary Autocannon is based only loosely on the Autocannon. While it has the same bore, it is capable of firing up to six times as many rounds as its standard cousin, allowing it to deal three times the damage of even an Ultra Autocannon. At the same time, each extra shot increases the amount of heat the autocannon builds and increases the chance for a jam. Uses RAC2 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Rotary Autocannon is based only loosely on the Autocannon. While it has the same bore, it is capable of firing up to six times as many rounds as its standard cousin, allowing it to deal three times the damage of even an Ultra Autocannon. At the same time, each extra shot increases the amount of heat the autocannon builds and increases the chance for a jam. Uses RAC2 Ammo.
content.content: 转轮式自动炮(RAC)仅在一定成都上基于自动炮. 虽然它们有相同的口径,但其发射能力是其标准同类的六倍,使其造成的伤害甚至是终极自动炮的三倍. 同时,发射每增加一次,自动炮产生的热量也会增加,并增加发生卡壳的可能性. 使用RAC2弹药

content.original: The Rotary Autocannon is based only loosely on the Autocannon. While it has the same bore, it is capable of firing up to six times as many rounds as its standard cousin, allowing it to deal three times the damage of even an Ultra Autocannon. At the same time, each extra shot increases the amount of heat the autocannon builds and increases the chance for a jam. Uses RAC5 Ammo.

content.original: An Improved One Shot version of the SRM2. Lighter than a proper SRM2 by removing its feed tubes, with the ammunition stored directely in the feed tubes instead. This of course reloading is not possible.
content.prevOriginal: An Improved One Shot version of the SRM2. Lighter than a proper SRM2 by removing its feed tubes, with the ammunition stored directely in the feed tubes instead. This of course reloading is not possible.
content.content: 改进的SRM2的一次性射击版本.过移除供弹机构,弹药直接储存在内置供弹器中,比原本的SRM2更轻.当然重这装填是不可能的.

content.original: The Streak SRM-2 launcher is a prototype SRM that uses an advanced active guidance system to track targets, but at the cost of 50% increased weight and heat generation. Uses Streak SRM Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Streak SRM-2 launcher is a prototype SRM that uses an advanced active guidance system to track targets, but at the cost of 50% increased weight and heat generation. Uses Streak SRM Ammo.

content.original: SRM6s are the largest available rack of Short-Range Missiles and pack considerable punch while also being lightweight. As for all SRMs, SRM6 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons. This is a one-shot version that only allows firing the internally stored six missiles.

content.content: SRM6是目前可用的最大型短程导弹发射器,具有相当大的威力,同时重量轻. 与其他武器相比,所有SRM6射击的命中率高于平均水平.这是一个一次性版本,只允许发射内部储存的六枚导弹.
